name: publisher/publisher
description: Library to publish multiple entries (all at once).

suggest.publisher/facebook-entry: Adds entries for posting on Facebook.
suggest.publisher/twitter-entry: Adds entries for posting on Twitter.
suggest.publisher/xing-entry: Adds entries for posting on XING.
suggest.phpoauthlib/requestor: An implementation of a RequestorFactory that uses lusitanian/oauth.
